name: Dig Yo'Self a Hole
description:
**Please Wait for Game to Load***

Your Pappie's givin' you some diggin' tools so now it's time to become a man and DIG!

Venture into the dessert, grasslands, or rocky areas and find some gold and diamonds.

However, becareful! You may come across some snakes or scorpions. If you get bit, find a plant and use the herb to heal your wounds.

The dessert can get mighty hot, so be sure to quench your thirst with some nice refreshing cactus juice.

Use the WASD buttons to move through the world, but watch your fuel meter! Dig up some oil to replenish your tank.

You got three of Pappies best diggin' tools! They work faster in different things so experiment. TAB to cycle through the tools.

If you run out of health, water, fuel, or money you aint coming home! 

Be careful out there 'n Good Luck!

Credits:

Graphics/Code: MastaCasta

Music: Bensound.com
